scripts.dev:ui: yarn setup:dev && concurrently -n api,ui  'yarn dev:ws:api' 'yarn dev:ws:ui''
scripts.dev:head: yarn setup:dev && concurrently -n api,head  'yarn dev:ws:api' 'yarn dev:ws:head'
scripts.dev:ws:head: yarn workspace head dev
scripts.build:head: yarn build:sdk && yarn build:ws:head
scripts.build:ws:api: echo 'Build API' && yarn workspace api build
scripts.build:ws:ui: echo 'Build UI' && yarn workspace ui build
scripts.build:ws:head: echo 'Build Head' && yarn workspace head build
scripts.setup:dev: docker compose --file ./packages/.docker/compose.dev.yml --env-file .env.defaults down --remove-orphans && docker compose --file ./packages/.docker/compose.dev.yml --env-file  .env.defaults up -d --remove-orphans
